descript.abstract: The shapefile associated with this metadata file represents different future scenarios of land use and vegetation for the Island of Maui, Hawaii. The polygons represent water-budget subareas developed by the U.S. Geological Survey as described in USGS SIR 2014-5168. The model was developed for estimating groundwater recharge and other water-budget components for each subarea, under current and future climate and land cover conditions. The four future land cover scenarios were developed by the Pacific RISA program at the East-West Center in collaboration with water resource managers, land use planners, developers, ranchers, agricultural producers, and others on Oahu and Maui. They represent a range of possible land cover futures for Maui based on different combinations of management decisions. Version 1-1 of the dataset has been updated to reflect the cessation of sugarcane farming activities in central Maui, based on an updated land cover map representing circa 2017 conditions. For more information on the methods and sources of data used to produce this shapefile, please contact the Pacific RISA program.
descript.purpose: The future land cover scenarios in this shapefile were developed in collaboration with stakeholders on Oahu and Maui who are interested in understanding how different land cover changes may impact groundwater recharge under future climate conditions on Maui. The future land cover scenarios are intended for use by the general public as a tool to explore different land use decisions, and may be useful as map outputs, descriptive tools, or land cover inputs for other spatial and numerical models for the island of Maui.

theme.themekey: Land Use and Land Cover Map

idinfo.useconst: Users are advised to read the dataset's metadata and USGS SIR 2014-5168 thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations https://pubs.er.usgs.gov/publication/sir20145168.
idinfo.native: Environment as of Metadata Creation: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.2 (Build 3552) Service Pack N/A (Build N/A)

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

procstep.procdesc: Development of the data set by the agency / individuals identified in the 'Originator' element in the Identification Info section of the record.

enttyp.enttypd: Table containing attribute information associated with the data set.

attr.attrdef: Unique identification number of each polygon

overview.eaover: The entity and attribute information provided here describes the tabular data associated with the data set. Please review the detailed descriptions that are provided (the individual attribute descriptions) for information on the values that appear as fields/table entries of the data set.
overview.eadetcit: The entity and attribute information was generated by the individual and/or agency identified as the originator of the data set. Please review the rest of the metadata file for additional details and information.

distinfo.distliab: Distributor assumes no liability for misuse of data.

stdorder.fees: None. No fees are applicable for obtaining the data set.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
